citeinfo.title: Database of USCG Underway Inspections of Alaska Fishing Vessels

descript.abstract: Information on vessels boarded by Coast Guard cutters in the Bering Sea and Gulf of Alaska. It includes the name and document number of the vessels boarded, the name of the cutter, the NMFS management zone, the fishing vessel's targeted species and any noted violations.
descript.purpose: The data is used to provide information for operational planning and inventory of the activities around Bering Sea and Gulf of Alaska

idinfo.accconst: Database is maintained on a standalone system and is considered sensitive.
idinfo.useconst: Information is sensitive and subject to certain restrictions under the Freedom of Information Act.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metac: Database is maintained on a standalone system and is considered sensitive.
metainfo.metuc: Information is sensitive and subject to certain restrictions under the Freedom of Information Act.
